Small Site Updates

Aug 10, 2025

To avoid being cubed by the Javascript-hating mob I foolishly created in my head, this needs to go down. I've culled it to below 300kB with some easy changes, unfortunately Nora's very cute 88x31 gif now takes up a third of the page size. This will be tolerated :3

Still considering should I post about projects that are identifiable to me IRL. Will err on the side of caution, though it'd be nice to have more links on the home page.
